bilingual.target: 侦探紧密地检查了证据。

bilingual.source: The company monitors its financial performance closely.
bilingual.target: 公司紧密地监控其财务表现。

bilingual.source: She followed the instructions closely to ensure success.
bilingual.target: 她紧密地按照指示操作以确保成功。

bilingual.source: The teacher watched the students closely during the exam.
bilingual.target: 老师在考试期间紧密地观察学生。

bilingual.source: The two friends have been working closely on the project.
bilingual.target: 这两位朋友一直在紧密地合作这个项目。

bilingual.source: The internet connects people from the whole world more closely.
bilingual.target: 互联网让全球的人们更紧密地联系在一起。

bilingual.source: Observation and reality entangles together closely in it.
bilingual.target: 观测与实在紧密地缠绕在一起。

bilingual.source: Their political careers had become closely intertwined.
bilingual.target: 他们的政治生涯已经紧密地结合在一起了。

bilingual.source: C. purchasing managers must closely supervise their buyers.
bilingual.target: 采购经理必须紧密地监督其采购人员.

bilingual.source: They fit closely to ge the rand connect with each other.
bilingual.target: 它们紧密地卡合在一起，联结成一个整体。

yingyinNormal.zh: 我们也一直在与国会密切磋商。

yingyinNormal.en: I know somebody who circles around me, a little too closely.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道有个人是绕着我转的，有点太近了。

yingyinNormal.en: Listen closely, April. I don't remember a time before living in that laboratory.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听我说，爱普尔，被带到实验室之前的事情我都不记得了。

yingyinNormal.en: Which is why I asked my daughter to join us. She'll have my seat by then, and you two will work closely.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以我叫我女儿也一起来了，到时她已经接替了我的席位，你俩可以密切合作。

yingyinNormal.en: If you want proof why you belong in Gryffindor, then I suggest you look more closely at this. Be careful.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你想验证你为什么属于格兰芬多，那么我建议你仔细的看一看这把剑。小心。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: You're lucky to have my sister for your wife, Lowell, and you be good to her. I'll be watching very closely.
yingyinNormal.zh: 拥有我姐姐做妻子你很幸运，洛威尔，对她好点，我会盯着你的。

yingyinNormal.en: Rebecca's vitals are good. She's gonna be asleep for a little while, but she's doing fine. We're monitoring her closely. Okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 丽贝卡生命体征正常。她还会再睡一段时间，她不会有事的，我们时刻监测着她。好。

yingyinNormal.en: A couple of tablespoons of the malt extract, closely followed by two tablespoons of black treacle. Using a hot spoon will help.
yingyinNormal.zh: 放几勺子麦芽酒，大约倒两勺的焦糖就行，用一个热勺子会有帮助。

yingyinNormal.en: And I could see her saying yes. When I look at this ring, all I see is a ring. Unless I look at it really closely and then I can see my own eye.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这枚戒指只让我看到一枚戒指，只有近看才会看到我的眼睛。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 紧接着(发生); 紧紧地

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: "Team" -oriented corporate vocabulary is <highlight>closely</highlight> related to sports culture.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以“团队”为导向的企业词汇与体育文化密切相关。

examination_example.sentence: Our legal system was designed to set law apart from politics precisely because they are so <highlight>closely</highlight> tied.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正是因为法律与政治紧密相连，我们的法律体系才旨在将二者区分开。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 紧接着(发生); 紧紧地

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: in a careful and attentive way; in a cautious or secretive way

examination_example.sentence: For cooperating <highlight>closely</highlight> with policymakers in developing countries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与发展中国家的政策制定者密切合作。

examination_example.sentence: It deterred luxury consumers who found their expensive clothing more <highlight>closely</highlight> associated with working-class youth culture than a prestigious heritage fashion house.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它让奢侈品消费者望而却步，他们发现自己的昂贵服装与工人阶级青年文化的联系比其与享有盛誉的传统时装屋更密切相关。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 亲密的；紧密的；亲近的；势均力敌的；（close的最高级）
adv. 接近地；严密地；亲近地；紧密地
adj. 关闭的；闭合的；保守的；歇业的；对外封闭的；闭关自守的；限于某些人的；不是对所有人都开放的；并非人人可得的；守旧的
n. 最后的节目；关闭者

word_family.mean: adj. 近的；接近的；靠近的；直系（尤指父母；兄弟姐妹）的；密切的；周全的；潮湿的；气闷的；接近；紧密的

examination_example.sentence: It is then clear that biological development and cultural development are <highlight>closely</highlight> tied.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那么很明显，生物发展和文化发展是紧密相连的。

examination_example.sentence: First, don't tie your shoes too <highlight>closely</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第一，不要把鞋带系得太紧。

sense_info_list.en: in a careful and attentive way; in a cautious or secretive way

examination_example.sentence: He was often seen watching plants <highlight>closely</highlight> and thinking of ways to improve them, just as many Chinese farmers do.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正如许多中国农民所做的那样，人们经常看到他密切观察植物，并思考如何改善它们。

examination_example.sentence: Look <highlight>closely</highlight> at the two figures on your left.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 仔细看你左边的两张图。
